text.div:
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/evidence-report-type defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
classification ClassificationThe report is primarily a listing of classifiers about the report subject.
search-results Search ResultsThe report is a composition of results generated in response to a search query.
resources-compiled Resource CompilationThe report is a composition containing one or more FHIR resources in the content.
text-structured Structured TextThe report is a structured representation of text.

name: EvidenceReportType
title: Evidence Report Type
description: The kind of report, such as grouping of classifiers, search results, or human-compiled expression.

concept.definition: The report is primarily a listing of classifiers about the report subject.
The report is a composition of results generated in response to a search query.
The report is a composition containing one or more FHIR resources in the content.
The report is a structured representation of text.
